content: m designs spa cloth an easy beginners project stitched using pure cotton yarn this project uses both knit and purl stitches and easy cast on and bind off methods detailed instructions for the above can be found on the internet or in a knitting techniques book the natural absorbent qualities of the cotton yarn make this a wonderful face cloth make three tie them up with a ribbon add a slice of your favorite handmade soap and give as a gift supplies knitting needles u s size 6 straight yarn 1 skein cotton dk weight will make more than one cloth blunt end tapestry needle stitching instructions using long tail cast on cast on 45 stitches row 1 thru 6 knit every row garter stitch row 7 knit row 8 k4 purl to last 4 stitches k4 repeat row 7 & 8 for 7 row stockinette stitch row 16 knit 1 row repeat row 7 & 8 for 9 row row 26 knit 1 row repeat row 7 & 8 for 9 row row 36 knit 1 row repeat row 7 & 8 for 9 row row 46 knit 1 row repeat row 7 & 8 for 9 row row 56- 60 knit bind off weave in yarn ends copyright m designs 2013 pattern may not be reproduced for sale or distribution without permission from mary turley/ m designs finished items may be reproduced for resale
